Token.Abstract: The main delegate protocol which serves the interested instance with information about changed validation states. The delegate inherits from UITextViewDelegate.
Will be called when a status changes from true to false or false to true.

Parameter.Name: validatorTextView
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the sending validator text field of type US2ValidatorTextView

Parameter.Name: isValid
Parameter.Abstract: Returns the status of the validation check

Token.Abstract: Will be called if the text field check failed.

Parameter.Name: validatorTextView
Parameter.Abstract: Instance of the sending validator text field of type US2ValidatorTextView

Parameter.Name: conditions
Parameter.Abstract: Collection of type US2ConditionCollection listing all violated conditions.
